title: The What
description: Muse is a music player intended to create playlists based on the user's mood ratio input. It's a simple, and intuitive player, based on Spotify's great songs collection, and the user's most-listened to artists and songs on it.

title: The Why
description: The inspiration behind this project was influenced on the premise that music can be used as a tool to help people cope with their emotions. It also serves as an assertive shuffler for all types of activities: from commuting to sports and social gatherings.

title: The How
description: At the core of this project is an algorithm that takes the user's music history on Spotify, and filters it according to the input emotion on Muse. A higher ratio will output upbeat songs, while a lower ratio outputs more mellow ones. This is fed by Spotify's API, based on OAuth2.0.
